thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Edson

author: Edson
title: Edson
text:
It's really frustrating when you get ripped off when you need to book a last minute flight, especially when a tragedy happens in the family! Got Quote: as high as 10K for a trip from SC to Brazil on other sites, with the lowest rate being a good $500 more than FlightHub.
I also noticed that most of the sites will actually raise their prices when you go back to have a second look.
I will make sure to check FlightHub first the next time I fly!
